transcription: Hey, I'm on the 2017 Indian Scout. This is my wife's motorcycle. Contrary to what people believe, she's a bad girl. It has the Vansenheim grenades on it as you can see. I'm just going to do a little test run for you. I got my son-in-law, he's on the camera. So check out the video and tell me what you think.  so  Go in!
